[set frames_munge] [perl arg="config"] my $ref = $Safe{'config'}{Variable}; foreach $i ( qw/ LEFTSIDE NO_RIGHT RIGHTSIDE COPYRIGHT MENUBAR MENUBOTTOM LOGOBAR / ) { undef $ref->{$i}; } return; [/perl] [/set] [perl arg=scratch] &tag_data('session', 'Autoload', undef, $Safe{scratch}{frames_munge}); return ''; [/perl] [comment] This page sets an Autoload macro for the user which removes the values of the MiniVend variables for the headers. It then loads a frame set. The same pages are used for frames as no frames, the difference is that the variables like LEFTSIDE and MENUBAR will not have anything in them. [/comment] __COMPANY__ Catalog <BODY MV="body 1"> [page noframes]Non-frames here[/page]. <!-- current page: @@MV_PAGE@@ -->
